quotes.author: Dave Ramsey
quotes.quote: A budget is telling your money where to go instead of wondering where it went.

quotes.author: Warren Buffett
quotes.quote: Do not save what is left after spending, but spend what is left after saving.

quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki
quotes.quote: It's not how much money you make, but how much money you keep.

quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin
quotes.quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.

quotes.author: Suze Orman
quotes.quote: People first, then money, then things.

quotes.author: Will Rogers
quotes.quote: Too many people spend money they haven't earned, to buy things they don't want, to impress people they don't like.

quotes.author: Dave Ramsey
quotes.quote: Financial peace isn't the acquisition of stuff. It's learning to live on less than you make.

quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki
quotes.quote: The rich don't work for money. They make money work for them.

quotes.author: Warren Buffett
quotes.quote: The stock market is designed to transfer money from the active to the patient.

quotes.author: Tony Robbins
quotes.quote: Money is a good servant but a bad master.

quotes.author: Benjamin Graham
quotes.quote: The intelligent investor is a realist who sells to optimists and buys from pessimists.

quotes.author: Mark Cuban
quotes.quote: Live like a student. Save like you're broke. Invest like you're rich.

quotes.author: Grant Cardone
quotes.quote: Never depend on a single income. Make investments to create a second source.

quotes.author: Peter Lynch
quotes.quote: Know what you own, and know why you own it.

quotes.author: Charlie Munger
quotes.quote: The big money is not in the buying and selling, but in the waiting.

quotes.author: Morgan Housel
quotes.quote: Building wealth has little to do with your income or investment returns, and lots to do with your savings rate.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.quote: Don't wish it were easier, wish you were better.

quotes.author: Ray Dalio
quotes.quote: He who lives by the crystal ball will eat shattered glass.

quotes.author: Jack Bogle
quotes.quote: Time is your friend; impulse is your enemy.

quotes.author: Napoleon Hill
quotes.quote: Money without financial intelligence is money soon gone.

quotes.author: George S. Clason
quotes.quote: A part of all you earn is yours to keep.

quotes.author: T. Harv Eker
quotes.quote: Rich people have small TVs and big libraries, and poor people have small libraries and big TVs.

quotes.author: Thomas J. Stanley
quotes.quote: Wealth is more often the result of a lifestyle of hard work, perseverance, planning, and self-discipline.

quotes.author: John C. Bogle
quotes.quote: The two greatest enemies of the equity fund investor are expenses and emotions.

quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie
quotes.quote: The first man gets the oyster, the second man gets the shell.

quotes.author: Arkad
quotes.quote: Pay yourself first.

quotes.author: Paul Clitheroe
quotes.quote: Money is a terrible master but an excellent servant.

quotes.author: Charles A. Jaffe
quotes.quote: It's not your salary that makes you rich, it's your spending habits.

quotes.author: Ramit Sethi
quotes.quote: Focus on the big wins, not the small savings.

quotes.author: David Bach
quotes.quote: Small amounts saved daily add up to huge investments in the end.

quotes.author: Helen Keller
quotes.quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.

quotes.author: Carl Richards
quotes.quote: Risk is what's left when you think you've thought of everything.

quotes.author: Jean Chatzky
quotes.quote: Money is about emotions. It's not about numbers.

quotes.author: Burton Malkiel
quotes.quote: A blindfolded monkey throwing darts at a newspaper's financial pages could select a portfolio that would do just as well as one carefully selected by experts.

quotes.author: Bill Gates
quotes.quote: It's fine to celebrate success but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.

quotes.author: Henry Ford
quotes.quote: Whether you think you can, or think you can't â€“ you're right.

quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash
quotes.quote: For every failure, there's an alternative course of action.

quotes.author: Sam Walton
quotes.quote: There is only one boss: the customer.

quotes.author: Phil Knight
quotes.quote: Don't tell people how to do things, tell them what to do and let them surprise you with their results.

quotes.author: Richard Branson
quotes.quote: Business opportunities are like buses, there's always another one coming.

quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller
quotes.quote: The most important thing for a young man is to establish credit.

quotes.author: Michael Bloomberg
quotes.quote: Life is too short to spend your time avoiding failure.

quotes.author: Mellody Hobson
quotes.quote: The biggest risk of all is not taking one.

quotes.author: Howard Schultz
quotes.quote: Risk more than others think is safe. Dream more than others think is practical.

quotes.author: Sophia Amoruso
quotes.quote: Money looks better in the bank than on your feet.

quotes.author: Barbara Corcoran
quotes.quote: You can't study to be an entrepreneur. Sometimes, you just have to jump.

quotes.author: Sara Blakely
quotes.quote: Don't be intimidated by what you don't know.

quotes.author: Daymond John
quotes.quote: Five days a week, I read my goals before I go to sleep and when I wake up.

quotes.author: Kevin O'Leary
quotes.quote: Money equals freedom.

quotes.author: Chris Sacca
quotes.quote: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication in investing.

quotes.author: Peter Thiel
quotes.quote: Competition is for losers.

quotes.author: Jack Ma
quotes.quote: Today is difficult, tomorrow is much more difficult, but the day after tomorrow is beautiful.
